title: Beyond Intervals: Sarah Sturm, Alexis Skarda, and Ellen Campbell Train for Leadville Together at 11,600ft
content:
'On the Up' shows how the three friends and competitors took a different approach to prepping for the 100-mile mountain bike race this year.

Read the full article at Beyond Intervals: Sarah Sturm, Alexis Skarda, and Ellen Campbell Train for Leadville Together at 11,600ft on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
